text: The Honor of Thieves is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Honor of ThievesPaolo Cherchi Usai. The Griffith Project, Volume 11 and stars Florence Lawrence, Harry Solter, and George Gebhardt. ==Actors== * Florence Lawrence as Rachel Einstein * Harry Solter as Mr. Einstein * George Gebhardt as Musician * Anita Hendrie as At Dance * Arthur V. Johnson as Customer / Musician * Wilfred Lucas * David Miles as At Dance * Owen Moore as Ned Grattan * Frank Powell * Mack Sennett as At Dance / Policeman ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Honor of Thieves
